A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really tried to like this movie. It was visually stunning and beautiful and every frame was flawless. Sadly that is the only good thing about this sorry excuse for a star wars film. The political input\, plot holes\, and destruction of the original trilogy characters is so egregious that I honestly don't even think my love for this franchise can handle it. I watch movies to be entertained and to see an interesting story unfold\, not to be subjected to propaganda and porgs.
